data: MDGNN Xu et al. (2024)
Multi-relational graph combining industry and institutional relationships
Hierarchical graph embedding combined with ALIBI positional encoding
IC improvement: 15% (CSI300) performs better on larger datasets
MASTER Li et al. (2024b)
Constructing dynamic stock correlation through alternating attention
Market-guided gating mechanism used for feature selection
Ranking metric: +13% Portfolio metric: +47% (CSI300, CSI800)
DoubleAdapt Zhao et al. (2023)
Double adaptation targeting streaming data distribution shift
Multi-head transformation layer used for feature and label adaptation
Consistent improvement across LSTM, GRU, Transformer implementations Model-agnostic adaptability
DPA-STIFormer Yan and Tan (2024)
Feature-centric temporal modeling
Dual-path mechanism combined with adaptive gating
Superior performance on CSI500, CSI1000, NASDAQ, NYSE Improved IC and Sharpe ratio
DANSMP Zhao et al. (2022)
High-level market knowledge graph
Dual attention network used for complex entity interaction
Return: 16.97% Sharpe ratio: 4.628 (CSI300E)
GINN Xu et al. (2024)
Integrating GARCH theory with neural networks
GARCH regularization in LSTM loss function
Consistent superiority across 7 global indices Robust zero-shot performance
DIFFSTOCK Daiya et al. (2024)
Diffusion model for market forecasting
Adaptive noise scheduling targeting stock volatility
Sharpe ratio improvement: NYSE: +7.92% NASDAQ: +6.18%
Wang et al. (2024b)
LLM integration for news processing
Text-based numerical prediction transformation
Superior performance in event-driven market shifts Multi-domain applicability
